shards.alertMessage: Hail Protectors! On Wednesday, July 30th, the European and Russian shards will be unavailable from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM Eastern (-4 GMT) as we conduct maintenance. The North American server will remain up and online as this work is completed, but our website logins and referral will be unavailable.
